<<<<<<< HEAD
A treatise of Gods free grace, and mans free will Perkins, William, 1558-1602.
[12], 184 p.
Printed by Iohn Legat, printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge, [Cambridge?] : 1601. And are to be sold at the signe of the Crowne in Pauls churchybard by Simon Waterson.
Dedication signed: William Perkins. Running title reads: Of mans free will, and Gods free grace. Pages 28-9, 48 and 135 misnumbered 48-9, 47 and 137. Some print show-through; several pages marked and stained. Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
=======
